metadata.title: Portuguese Verb Tenses Test
metadata.description: Topic-based diagnostic test for verb tenses

questions.question: What does this mean?
options: I am living in São Paulo
I will live in São Paulo

questions.pt: Eu estudo português todos os dias
questions.question: What does this mean?

questions.pt: Eu como pão todos os dias
questions.question: What does this mean?

questions.en: I am going to study Portuguese
questions.question: Complete the sentence:

questions.en: She is going to stay at home
questions.question: Complete the sentence:
What does this mean?
options: I used to go to Brazil

questions.question: What does this mean?
options: I used to be a teacher
I seem to be a teacher

questions.en: We used to eat a lot
questions.question: Complete the sentence:

questions.en: We used to come here always
questions.question: Complete the sentence:
What does this mean?
options: I hope you will be strong
I want you to be strong

questions.question: What does this mean?
questions.correct: If I were rich, I would travel
options: If I were rich, I would travel
If I was rich, I traveled
If I am rich, I will travel
If I were rich, I travel
When I was rich, I traveled
If I were rich, I will travel

questions.question: What does this mean?
questions.correct: If I knew, I would say
options: If I knew, I would say
If I know, I will say
If I knew, I will say

questions.pt: Quando eu tiver tempo, vou viajar
questions.question: What does this mean?
questions.correct: When I have time, I will travel
options: When I have time, I will travel
If I have time, I will travel
When I had time, I traveled
When I have time, I travel
If I had time, I would travel
When I will have time, I will travel

questions.pt: A casa em que moro é grande
questions.question: What does this mean?
questions.correct: The house in which I live is big
options: The house in which I live is big
The house where I live is big
The big house I live in
I live in a big house
The house that I live is big
In the house I live it is big

questions.en: The table on which I write
questions.question: Complete the sentence:

questions.en: The reason for which we came (formal)
questions.question: Complete the sentence (formal):

questions.en: The documents with which I work (formal, plural)
questions.question: Complete the sentence (formal):
What does this mean?
options: He said he wants to come

questions.question: What does this mean?
options: She said she would be tired
She was tired and said it

questions.question: What does this mean?
questions.correct: I was going to travel but I cancelled
options: I was going to travel but I cancelled
I will travel but I cancelled
I went to travel but I cancelled
I am going to travel but I will cancel
I wanted to travel but I cancelled
I used to travel but I cancelled

questions.question: What does this mean?
options: The book will be written in 1900
The book went to be written in 1900

questions.pt: O português é falado no Brasil
questions.question: What does this mean?
options: Portuguese will be spoken in Brazil
Portuguese is being spoken in Brazil

questions.en: The store is closed on Sundays
questions.question: Complete the sentence:
What does this mean?
questions.correct: I went back to studying Portuguese
options: I went back to studying Portuguese
I came back to study Portuguese

questions.question: What does this mean?
questions.correct: I kept waiting for an hour
options: I kept waiting for an hour
I stayed waiting for an hour
I was waiting for an hour
I will wait for an hour
I am waiting for an hour

questions.question: What does this mean?
options: I am starting to work here
I work here from the start

questions.question: What does this mean?
options: He will give me the book
He is giving me the book
He gave the book to me

questions.question: What does this mean?
options: They will tell me the truth
They are telling me the truth
They said the truth to me

questions.question: What does this mean?
questions.correct: I asked him/her for a favor
options: I asked him/her for a favor
I ask him/her for a favor
He asked me for a favor
I will ask for a favor
I am asking for a favor
I requested a favor from him

questions.question: What does this mean?
options: He said for me to wait
He will tell me to wait
He is telling me to wait

questions.en: You all told him to leave
questions.question: Complete the sentence:
What does this mean?
options: She will ask me to help
She is asking me to help

questions.en: You all asked her to wait
